review_text: I am already familiar with all three herbs but took them separately, it's normally my preference not to use pre-mixed combinations but I thought it a good idea to give it a chance in this case and I like it, I'm going to keep it this. Feeling frazzled and stressed out? Get restorative relaxation with the synergistic blend of anti-stress herbs in Swanson Premium Lemon Balm, Passion Flower, Skullcap Complex. review_text: Feeling stressed and tired? Relax and rejuvenate with the synergistic blend of anti-stress herbs in Swanson Premium Lemon Balm, Passionflower, and Skullcap Complex. This unique formula combines three of the world's most effective stress-relieving herbs to help calm your nerves and restore calm to your life. Each of the herbs in this formula, individually, has been proven to safely promote relaxation. Together, they make for one of the most effective combinations ever created.

I have tried skullcap, lemon balm, and passion flower. I like passion flower, but I bought this blend because it was more economical. All ingredients are good for sleep, and the blend seems to have a synergistic effect. I take it just before going to bed, and it works gently for me. It doesn't leave a lingering feeling the next morning. It seems that some states in the U.S. have restrictions on the use of passion flower. I'm used to drinking this herb, so I feel comfortable using it. I also appreciate the large size.

I bought this to take when I feel stressed.The first time I took it, I felt sleepy, so now I take it before going to bed.Even if I take it during the day, I don't fall asleep.The size is the same as a capsule from an overseas supplement. I think it's hard to drink if you're not used to it. It's a herbal ingredient, but it doesn't have a particular taste. It was a good purchase for me.

Added three relaxing and soothing herbs for better effect. When I am nervous and anxious, it can greatly alleviate my problem of gastrointestinal diarrhea. I will make tea and drink it before going to bed. The effect is faster and the taste is better. Have repurchased many times. It is very helpful for sleeping and calming the mood, and also improves irritable bowel syndrome.
